name: change-audio-input-volume
title: Change Audio Input Volume
description: Change the volume or your current microphone.
author: codingcodax

commands.name: turn-volume-up
commands.title: Turn Volume Up
commands.subtitle: Increase Audio Input Volume
commands.description: Increase the volume of your current audio input (microphone).

commands.name: turn-volume-down
commands.title: Turn Volume Down
commands.subtitle: Decrease Audio Input Volume
commands.description: Decrease the volume of your current audio input (microphone).

commands.name: toggle-mute
commands.title: Toggle Mute
commands.subtitle: Mute/Unmute Audio Input
commands.description: Mute or unmute your current audio input (microphone).

commands.name: quarter-volume
commands.title: Set Volume to 25%
commands.description: Set the volume of your current audio input (microphone) to 25%.

commands.name: half-volume
commands.title: Set Volume to 50%
commands.description: Set the volume of your current audio input (microphone) to 50%.

commands.name: three-quarters-volume
commands.title: Set Volume to 75%
commands.description: Set the volume of your current audio input (microphone) to 75%.

commands.name: full-volume
commands.title: Set Volume to 100%
commands.description: Set the volume of your current audio input (microphone) to 100%.
